New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [750pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Fyreslayers) [750pts]

    • Uncategorised

      • Magmic Battleforge

        Categories: FYRESLAYERS, MAGMIC BATTLEFORGE, SCENERY

        Unit Abilities: Molten Blessing, Spending the Forge


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Molten Blessing At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIEST within 6" of a Magmic Battleforge can control its magmic energies. If they do so, until the end of that phase, add 1 to prayer rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIESTS while they are within 18" of that Magmic Battleforge. You cannot use the Molten Blessing ability and the Spending the Forge ability for the same Magmic Battleforge in the same phase. Battletome: Fyreslayers Official Errata, May 2019
        Spending the Forge Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIEST within 6" of a Magmic Battleforge can spend all of the forge’s energy instead of using its Molten Blessing ability. If they do so, until the start of your next hero phase, you can re-roll save rolls of 1 for friendly FYRESLAYERS units on the battlefield. However, for the rest of the battle, FYRESLAYERS PRIESTS can no longer use this Magmic Battleforge’s Molten Blessing ability.

    • Battleline [160pts]

      • Vulkite Bezerkers [160pts]

        Selections: 10 Vulkite Berzerkers [160pts], Fyresteel War-pick

        Categories: DUARDIN, VULKITE BERZERKERS, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Battleline

        Unit: Vulkite Bezerkers, Unit Abilities: Bezerk Fury, Bladed Slingshields, Horn of Grimnir, Karl, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit), Fyresteel Warpick


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Vulkite Bezerkers 4"275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bezerk Fury Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can choose to unleash this unit’s berserk fury. If you do so, until the end of that phase, if a model from this unit is slain, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Bladed Slingshields After a unit armed with Bladed Slingshields makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit and roll a dice for each model from the charging unit within 8" of that enemy unit. For each 6, the enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target a unit armed with Bladed Slingshields if the target unit did not make a charge move in the same turn.
        Horn of Grimnir 1 in every 5 models in this unit can have a Horn of Grimnir. Add 1 to charge rolls for units that include any Horns of Grimnir.
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit) Missile8"15+5+-1
        Fyresteel Warpick Melee1"23+4+-11

    • Battalion [590pts]

      • Battalion: Vostarg Forge Brethren [590pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Heir of the Fyreheart Temple

        • Auric Hearthguard [120pts]

          Selections: 5 Auric Hearthguards [120pts]

          Categories: AURIC HEARTHGUARD, DUARDIN, ORDER, FYRESLAYERS, Other

          Unit: Auric Hearthguard, Unit Abilities: Karl, Molten Rockbolts, Sworn Protectors, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit), Magmapike, Magmapike (Missile)

        • Auric Hearthguard [120pts]

          Selections: 5 Auric Hearthguards [120pts]

          Categories: AURIC HEARTHGUARD, DUARDIN, ORDER, FYRESLAYERS, Other

          Unit: Auric Hearthguard, Unit Abilities: Karl, Molten Rockbolts, Sworn Protectors, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit), Magmapike, Magmapike (Missile)

        • Auric Hearthguard [120pts]

          Selections: 5 Auric Hearthguards [120pts]

          Categories: AURIC HEARTHGUARD, DUARDIN, ORDER, FYRESLAYERS, Other

          Unit: Auric Hearthguard, Unit Abilities: Karl, Molten Rockbolts, Sworn Protectors, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit), Magmapike, Magmapike (Missile)

        • Auric Runesmiter [120pts]

          Categories: AURIC RUNESMITER, DUARDIN, HERO, PRIEST, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Leader

          Unit: Auric Runesmiter, Unit Abilities: Magmic Tunnelling, Runic Empowerment, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero), Latch-axe


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Heir of the Fyreheart Temple If a friendly unit of AURIC HEARTHGUARD from this battalion is wholly within 12" of Dhurgan when he uses his Magmic Prayer of Runic Empowerment ability, the prayers is answered on a 2+ instead of 3+.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Hearthguard 4"275+
        Auric Runesmiter 4"575+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Magmapike missile weapon.
        Magmic Tunnelling Instead of setting up this model on the battlefield, you can place this model to one side and say that it is set up underground as a reserve unit. If you do so, when you would set up another friendly FYRESLAYERS unit, instead of setting up that unit on the battlefield, you can say that it is joining this model underground as a reserve unit. 1 unit can join this model in this way. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up this model anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units; then set up any unit that joined this model wholly within 12" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units underground that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are destroyed.
        Molten Rockbolts Add 1 to the Damage characteristic for attacks made by Magmapike missile weapons that target MONSTER. In addition, if any wounds are inflicted on a MONSTER by Magmapike missile weapons, roll a dice. On a 4+, until the end of that unit’s next turn, halve that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit.
        Runic Empowerment At the start of your hero phase, this model can chant this prayer. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit wholly within 12" of this model, or wholly within 18" of this model if this model is armed with a Forge Key. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        Sworn Protectors Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly FYRESLAYERS HERO that is not mounted on a MAGMADROTH and is within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. On a 4+ that wound or mortal wound is negated, and you must choose a friendly unit with this ability that is within 3" to suffer 1 mortal wound after all wounds or mortal wounds have been allocated to that friendly HERO.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero) Missile8"15+5+-1
        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit) Missile8"15+5+-1
        Latch-axe Melee1"14+3+-2
        Magmapike Melee1"14+3+-1
        Magmapike (Missile) Missile18"24+3+-11

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Fyreslayers

          Selections: Greyfyrd

          Categories: GREYFYRD

          Battle Trait: Spoils of Victory, Ur-gold Runes, Command Abilities: Expert Cohesion, Ur-Gold Rune: Rune of Awakened Steel, Rune of Farsight, Rune of Fiery Determination, Rune of Fury, Rune of Relentless Zeal, Rune of Searing Heat


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Spoils of Victory You can choose 2 additional GREYFYRD HEROES from your army to have artefacts of power.
        Ur-gold Runes At the start of your hero phase, you can activate one of the following six ur-gold runes. To do so, state which rune will be activated and roll a dice. On a 1-5, the rune has the standard effect. On a 6 it also has the enhanced effect. The effect(s) of the rune lasts until the start of your next hero phase. Each ur-gold rune can only be activated once in each battle, and no more than one can be actived at the same time. Once you have used a rune, you can choose a new one to use in your next hero phase, but you cannot use the same one again.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Expert Cohesion You can use this command ability in the combat phase when a friendly GREYFYRD HERO is picked to fight. Other friendly GREYFYRD HEROES that are not mounted on a MAGMADROTH and are within 3 of that HERO can fight immediately afterwards, before your oppenent gets the option to pick a unit to fight. Any model that does so cannot fight again in that combat phase unless an ability or spell allows them to fight more than once.
        Ur-Gold Rune EffectEnhanced Effect Ref
        Rune of Awakened Steel Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units by 1.Improve the Rend characteristic by a further 1.
        Rune of Farsight Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Fiery Determination Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Friendly FYRESLAYERS units do not have to take battleshock tests.
        Rune of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Relentless Zeal Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Searing Heat If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon for that attack.Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly FYRESLAYERS units when this rune is activated; on a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Fyreslayers

          Selections: Lofnir

          Categories: LOFNIR

          Battle Trait: Ur-gold Runes, Venerators of Vulcatrix, Command Abilities: Torrent of Magma, Ur-Gold Rune: Rune of Awakened Steel, Rune of Farsight, Rune of Fiery Determination, Rune of Fury, Rune of Relentless Zeal, Rune of Searing Heat


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Ur-gold Runes At the start of your hero phase, you can activate one of the following six ur-gold runes. To do so, state which rune will be activated and roll a dice. On a 1-5, the rune has the standard effect. On a 6 it also has the enhanced effect. The effect(s) of the rune lasts until the start of your next hero phase. Each ur-gold rune can only be activated once in each battle, and no more than one can be actived at the same time. Once you have used a rune, you can choose a new one to use in your next hero phase, but you cannot use the same one again.
        Venerators of Vulcatrix Each MAGMADROTH in a LOFNIR army, instead of only 1, can be given a Magmadroth trait.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Torrent of Magma You can use this command ability in your shooting phase. If you do so, pick an enemy unit within 12" of a friendly LOFNIR PRIEST. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made with Magmapikes by friendly units that target that enemy unit. The same unit cannot be picked to be affected by this command ability more than once per phase.
        Ur-Gold Rune EffectEnhanced Effect Ref
        Rune of Awakened Steel Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units by 1.Improve the Rend characteristic by a further 1.
        Rune of Farsight Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Fiery Determination Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Friendly FYRESLAYERS units do not have to take battleshock tests.
        Rune of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Relentless Zeal Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Searing Heat If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon for that attack.Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly FYRESLAYERS units when this rune is activated; on a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Fyreslayers

          Selections: Vostarg

          Categories: VOSTARG

          Battle Trait: Fearsome Surge, Ur-gold Runes, Command Abilities: Honour Our Ancestors, Ur-Gold Rune: Rune of Awakened Steel, Rune of Farsight, Rune of Fiery Determination, Rune of Fury, Rune of Relentless Zeal, Rune of Searing Heat


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Fearsome Surge Add 1 to charge rolls for VOSTARG units. In addition, in your movement phase in the first battle round, if you declare a friendly VOSTARG unit will run, do not make a run roll. Instead, add 6" to the Move characteristic of all models in that unit for that phase.
        Ur-gold Runes At the start of your hero phase, you can activate one of the following six ur-gold runes. To do so, state which rune will be activated and roll a dice. On a 1-5, the rune has the standard effect. On a 6 it also has the enhanced effect. The effect(s) of the rune lasts until the start of your next hero phase. Each ur-gold rune can only be activated once in each battle, and no more than one can be actived at the same time. Once you have used a rune, you can choose a new one to use in your next hero phase, but you cannot use the same one again.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Honour Our Ancestors You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick a friendly VOSTARG HERO. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO and friendly units of VULKITE BERZERKERS and HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS wholly within 12" of that HERO. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase.
        Ur-Gold Rune EffectEnhanced Effect Ref
        Rune of Awakened Steel Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units by 1.Improve the Rend characteristic by a further 1.
        Rune of Farsight Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Fiery Determination Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Friendly FYRESLAYERS units do not have to take battleshock tests.
        Rune of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Relentless Zeal Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Searing Heat If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon for that attack.Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly FYRESLAYERS units when this rune is activated; on a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Fyreslayers

          Selections: Hermdar

          Categories: HERMDAR

          Battle Trait: Seize by Force, Ur-gold Runes, Command Abilities: Skull-breakers and Oath-takers, Ur-Gold Rune: Rune of Awakened Steel, Rune of Farsight, Rune of Fiery Determination, Rune of Fury, Rune of Relentless Zeal, Rune of Searing Heat


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Seize by Force HERMDAR units wholly within enemy territory or wholly within 12" of an objective do not take battleshock tests.
        Ur-gold Runes At the start of your hero phase, you can activate one of the following six ur-gold runes. To do so, state which rune will be activated and roll a dice. On a 1-5, the rune has the standard effect. On a 6 it also has the enhanced effect. The effect(s) of the rune lasts until the start of your next hero phase. Each ur-gold rune can only be activated once in each battle, and no more than one can be actived at the same time. Once you have used a rune, you can choose a new one to use in your next hero phase, but you cannot use the same one again.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Skull-breakers and Oath-takers You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. Pick 1 friendly HERMDAR VULKITE BERZERKERS unit or 1 friendly HERMDAR HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS unit wholly within 12" of a HERMDAR HERO. That unit fights at the start of that combat phase, before the players pick any other units to fight with in that combat phase.
        Ur-Gold Rune EffectEnhanced Effect Ref
        Rune of Awakened Steel Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units by 1.Improve the Rend characteristic by a further 1.
        Rune of Farsight Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Fiery Determination Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Friendly FYRESLAYERS units do not have to take battleshock tests.
        Rune of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Relentless Zeal Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Searing Heat If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon for that attack.Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly FYRESLAYERS units when this rune is activated; on a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
